channel.title: How can i make barrage freeze
channel.description: my server source didnt come with ice barrage, when u clicked it would teleother them, but i got ice barrage working but the only thing is it doesnt freeze

item.title: How can i make barrage freeze
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

[quote=“pure barrage, post:8, topic:173153”]well i dont know what a ice barrage code looks like this is what mine looks like

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { hitDiff = misc.random(30); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(369, 1, 1); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); //stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }[/quote]

you need to add this castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); into the part were it says castOnPlayer.inCombat(); so it will say castOnPlayer.inCombat(); castOnPlayer.uberentangle();

if your source is similar to the one im using lawl

Read full topic

item.title: How can i make barrage freeze
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Ok. Make a timer, and when you get hit by an ice barrage have the timer equal 40. Then make it decrease by one in process() which is called every half a second.
Finally, add an if statement in the walking packet.

Read full topic
